headline: Surf Air Mobility (SRFM) Valuation Check As Short Interest Jumps And SurfOS Palantir Partnership Advances
summary: Surf Air Mobility (SRFM) is back in focus after short interest climbed to 13.13% of its float, just as the company detailed fresh funding and product progress for its Palantir-powered SurfOS aviation software platform. See our latest analysis for Surf Air Mobility. The recent SurfOS funding update and Palantir partnership news have arrived alongside sharp price swings, with a 66% 7 day share price return and a 35% decline over 90 days, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 30% remains...

headline: Cathie Wood’s ARK Takes a New Stake in Broadcom—and Sold Another Hot Stock
summary: ARK Invest, the asset-management company founded by stockpicker Cathie Wood, has its hands in industries from defense to robotics.  The fund made key changes to its holdings this week that included a new stake in a hot semiconductor company and a sale of shares in another trendy name.  A Jan. 8 trading disclosure shows the  added  Broadcom  to its portfolio through the purchase of 31,573 shares, valued at some $10.5 million based on Thursday’s closing price of $332.48.

headline: High Growth Tech Stocks In The US For January 2026
summary: As we enter January 2026, the U.S. stock market is experiencing a mixed performance with the Dow Jones Industrial Average showing gains while the tech-heavy Nasdaq has faced challenges due to a downturn in data-storage shares. In this fluctuating environment, identifying high growth tech stocks requires careful consideration of their resilience and potential for innovation amidst broader economic indicators and market sentiment.
